tool.name: ls
tool.description:
Tool for listing files in the virtual filesystem. Shows all files that have been created during the current session.
This is useful for: - Getting an overview of available files - Checking what files have been created by other agents - Finding files by name pattern - Understanding the current project structure

parameters.param: Optional pattern to filter files (supports basic wildcards)
Whether to show detailed file information (size, type, dates)

example.output: index.html (156 bytes, html, 2024-01-15T10:30:00Z) styles.css (89 bytes, css, 2024-01-15T10:31:00Z) script.js (234 bytes, javascript, 2024-01-15T10:32:00Z)
